website_summaries.verdict: Long spray time gives more time to react in an attack. A safe choice.
pros: Good formula and spray distance, but also includes a 30-day money back guarantee if you're unsure of your purchase

customer_reviews.title: No bears yet but I keep it handy for people attacks in my car.
customer_reviews.text: If you buy this item watch the Youtube video on how to use. It gives you some real pointers of what to do and not to do.
customer_reviews.author: Gatlin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I fought off a pitbull that chased me across my yard with this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: S. Rose

customer_reviews.title: Guard Alaska great product with good packaging
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I have always purchased this brand. One reason I like it is because of the trigger assembly, which makes accidental firing highly unlikely but is easy to remove safety when needed. Fast shipping and fair price too.
customer_reviews.author: WindyW

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind.
customer_reviews.text: Got them as promised and at a good price. Summering in the Colorado high country (11,000 ft.) we have our share of black bears so I always keep a canister with when I'm hiking or fishing. Have been lucky enough to not have to use it, but it is good to know I have it if I have to.
customer_reviews.author: Walt M

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff
customer_reviews.text: Comes with an awesome holster. I don’t know how effective it is on Bears 🐻 and honestly I hope I never find out. It is also an effective weapon for personal protection on the trail.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Foster

customer_reviews.title: Glad I had it
customer_reviews.text: Went backpacking in bear country but didn't get up close with any. Did see many other hikers carrying this brand of spray. Not sure how well it works but glad to be carrying mine.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A must have product, you hope you will never use!
customer_reviews.author: Frederick Bloemker

customer_reviews.title: Looks like it will work
customer_reviews.text: Looks good. I haven’t had to use it. I’m still alive. 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Engineerrock

customer_reviews.title: Life saver against any critter.
customer_reviews.text: Very good price for these units. They will stop anything that breaths. One breath and the brakes come on, and flight becomes the new goal.

customer_reviews.title: Bear Repellent
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the product. Received exactly how described. Happy with purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Bear spray 9 ounce

customer_reviews.title: Alaska Bear Spray
customer_reviews.text: Haven't tried it yet I appreciated it - have read several reviews and seems like a great product. I will recommend it and seller. Thank you.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Glad we didn’t have to use it. The holster was nice

customer_reviews.title: Haven't used them hopefully I won't have to but one ...
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used them hopefully I won't have to but one must always be prepared in BEAR COUNTRY and this is very much a part of my get home safe kit

customer_reviews.title: If you’re in the wood only fools go without it
customer_reviews.text: Easy and portable will let you know more if a bear finds me. Safety first!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas B.

customer_reviews.title: Don't go into bear country without spray!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a Yellowstone trip. It's a really good value for the 2 cans with a holster. Didn't need to use them, but it's important to have bear spray with just in case. These shipped really quickly too!
customer_reviews.author: KeriP

customer_reviews.title: good sheath with a belt loop
customer_reviews.text: looks good, hope i don’t have to use it ...
customer_reviews.author: Michael Lortie

customer_reviews.title: These were purchased for close friends who felt the need ...
customer_reviews.text: These were purchased for close friends who felt the need to be ready to protect themselves. I hope they never have to use it, but I know the product will be dependable and ready to use if necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Chartj

customer_reviews.title: Nice Container and Holder
customer_reviews.text: Hopefully I will never have to use this, but its heavy duty and very nicely fits on a belt loop or attach to a bag. Definitely great investment for your safety.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Put myself out of action just testing the thing!
customer_reviews.text: Sprayed it just to make sure it work. A split-second blast into the sink, no direct spray, I was in the bathroom for 5 minutes, my face leaking from every orifice, coughing like...I was hit with bear mace! Powerful jet of spray, should do its job.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: I have it just in case .. I hope I don’t have to use it ..
customer_reviews.text: If it can stop a Bear ... it should have no problems with dogs ...
customer_reviews.author: Sal

customer_reviews.title: Hello Bears
customer_reviews.text: Have not needed to use it yet. Like the whole package.

customer_reviews.title: No Bears
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Just carrying it kept the bears away! Hope I never have to test it but it seems like good insurance.

customer_reviews.title: work
customer_reviews.text: strong smell to it but grate range of fire just a little big to carry

customer_reviews.title: As expected.
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had to use it - thank goodness but the product looked good - a little large but manageable.
customer_reviews.author: Reva Payne

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I can;t say how it would work on a bear. I bought it to use on loose dogs in the neighborhood. It worked great the one time I used it. It has a spray time of only about 9 seconds,
customer_reviews.author: jofjones

customer_reviews.title: Great product and a great company that stands behind it's product!  A+++
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for just walking around the neighborhood at night in a place where you can't carry concealed due to idiotic laws. This and a stun gun flashlight and all is well.
customer_reviews.author: Robert English

customer_reviews.title: Better safe than sorry
customer_reviews.text: Did not have to use but it really helps you sleeping outdoors on a tent if you have it around.
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Better to have than not
customer_reviews.text: Came in handy for our trip to Yellowstone. I saw a lot of families carrying the same brand. Study packaging as well.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Lopez

customer_reviews.title: This is potent protection from just about anything. I ...
customer_reviews.text: This is potent protection from just about anything. I even got rid of some ground hogs by spraying their holes when they were NOT in them. No , do not spray them as they are so darn cute.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Peace of Mind at a Reasonable Price!
customer_reviews.text: What peace of mind this will provide when I am fishing in the mountains of Montana. I haven't come across a bear yet, but have seen bear signs, so this may just be a life-saver in the future.
customer_reviews.author: LEM

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not easy to release safety. Accidentally sprayed myself and ruin clothes when releasing safety

customer_reviews.title: Wild animal Interlopers beware!
customer_reviews.text: Pity the poor coyote , who comes anywhere near my Chihuahuas!

customer_reviews.title: ... have to use it on our trip - but happy we had it with us
customer_reviews.text: Thankfully we didn't have to use it on our trip - but happy we had it with us!
customer_reviews.author: Denise Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Home Defense when there are no bears around!
customer_reviews.text: My wife won't shoot anyone....so this is our go to home defense weapon....backed up by a Jose Conseco 32" baseball bat for the Coup de Grace!
customer_reviews.author: Stevie

customer_reviews.title: I haven`t had occasion to use it yet but the ...
customer_reviews.text: I haven`t had occasion to use it yet but the peace of mind of having it to carry when I go for walks is worth it. I kinda hope I`ll never need it.
customer_reviews.author: Ram Bunctious

customer_reviews.title: That bear is going to be pretty close before it has any effect
customer_reviews.text: When i tested the spray only air came out. So i shook it up and air came out again, Bam! Dead by Bear attack. Finally on the 3rd time it started to spray, i expected a stream but it was more of a fog and it does not appear to shoot as far as they say. That bear is going to be pretty close before it has any effect. I tried to order the other brand but they will not ship to California. Hopefully it sprays material when needed in an emergency.
customer_reviews.author: Bear Breakfast

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I hope I never need it, but I have it if necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Ethel S. Coughlin

customer_reviews.title: but when the two dogs approached her it worked just fine. They ran off with their tails between their ...
customer_reviews.text: This product lives up to its claims. It probably saved my mom from serious injury when she was attacked by two huge dogs on her morning walk. I got it for her because of bear sightings in her area, but when the two dogs approached her it worked just fine. They ran off with their tails between their legs. The only caution is to try to avoid "blow back" because some of the spray did get on her and her dog, but they recovered quickly with no lasting effects. I am so thankful she had the Bear Guard Alaska Peper Spray with her when those 150 + pound dogs charged her.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly McNair

customer_reviews.title: bear pepper spray
customer_reviews.text: I bring it with me twice a day when I walk my dog in the woods. I haven't had to use it yet (thank goodness) but it makes me feel better to have it.
customer_reviews.author: tak

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for serious user
customer_reviews.text: One by the front door, one in the RV. Ready !
customer_reviews.author: CraigAZ

customer_reviews.title: Yep
customer_reviews.text: Everything as far as i know. I didn't shoot them so im not sure of the actual performance of the product.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we wanted. Hopefully we won't ever have to use it.

customer_reviews.title: Saved Me
customer_reviews.text: I used this twice to protect myself and it totally saved my butt. I now have it in all my cars and in my office.

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: If you hike in the wilderness you gotta have this!

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product! One of the things you should buy but hope never have to use :)
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! One of the things you should buy but hope never have to use :)

customer_reviews.text: Good value for the money. Didn't use it, but I wouldn't hike in Yellowstone without it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Erich Woelich

customer_reviews.title: A good item to never use
customer_reviews.text: The spray and holster work well and I carried it on several backpacking trips in the Rockies this summer. Happily, I've never had to use it. That would be the real test.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Could not give it 5 stars since I didn't have ...
customer_reviews.text: Could not give it 5 stars since I didn't have to use it. Four stars for peace of mind. P.S. Airlines will not allow as carry-on or checked baggage.
customer_reviews.author: James S Heslin

customer_reviews.title: Bear Guard Bear Pepper Spray
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2. Took these on a 3 week road trip through Yellowstone, Bryce, Zion, Grand Tetons and 5 states. Each time we went out for a hike or kayaked, we each had them attached to our back packs. Each came with a heavy duty case, which made attaching to the backpacks that much easier and secure. Never had to use them, but knowing we had them was the smart choice/move.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I take this item with me when backpacking out in the woods....
customer_reviews.author: Navyrick

customer_reviews.title: ... I won't have to use it but feel it's better to be prepared when in bear and cougar country
customer_reviews.text: Hoping I won't have to use it but feel it's better to be prepared when in bear and cougar country.
customer_reviews.author: Fitz30

customer_reviews.title: The REAL DEAL in wilderness protection
customer_reviews.text: Large size with holder....not a small whimpy container for personal protection -- this will get the job done out in the wilderness.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Adam

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Only received one can, and no holster-stated on package that there should be two cans and a holster but only the one can in box. Very disappointed as I was excited that I could have this delivered before Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: trish

customer_reviews.title: Bear Guard
customer_reviews.text: Well didn't need to use it but what seem to be a large bottle didn't bother me at all holstered to my belt going through the woods and getting in the truck. I didn't even notice I had it on most of the time.
customer_reviews.author: Bart

customer_reviews.title: Bear spray
customer_reviews.text: The service is prompt and problem free. The product seems to be well made and conveniently sized. One modification I made is that I drill a hole on the yellow-orange 'safety guard' and attached an elastic string to secure it with the can handle. I know that this can easily get detached and consequently be lost. I know that I can feel a little bit secure knowing that if I get stranded in an isolated area, this spray can deter bears as well as other wild animals.
customer_reviews.author: MannyHM

customer_reviews.title: Very very great product
customer_reviews.text: This project shoots 30 feet and can be reused and is better for taking down people then regular maze. I don't want to have to be 2 feet to spray somebody, and only use it once. If it can take down a bear it definitely can take down a big guy.
customer_reviews.author: Good advice

customer_reviews.title: I actually had to use it.
customer_reviews.text: While hiking in wyoming I was chased by a moose. I sprayed it in the face twice using most of the can. It retreated and fled. This stuff is good for more than just bears. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: This will stop a freaking Dinosaur
customer_reviews.text: OMG I accidently spray this in my face. Took me hours to get it off and multiple washes to get it out of my clothing.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Derry

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for road ragers
customer_reviews.text: Dropped a dude instantly who thought he would get away with slapping my truck. He was screaming like a baby as I drove away laughing my ars off.
customer_reviews.author: John Q Public

customer_reviews.title: Carrying Case
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had to use the product and hope not to use it, but I did note that the top of the case is almost too short to fit over the top of the spray can. You have to really tug on it just to get it part way to the velcro. The can slides in and out of the hoster easily, but it is just hard to secure the top flap.
customer_reviews.author: Novelist

customer_reviews.title: Used it on a fishing trip.
customer_reviews.text: Product appears to be perfect for the job. i never to use this product so i cant completely rate. it was nice having it with me for defense against a bear.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: very cheap holster, have not had to use the spray yet.
customer_reviews.author: wildgw

customer_reviews.title: I like it... Good protection
customer_reviews.text: I have not used this and I hope I never have to but it gives me a good feeling to have it with me.
customer_reviews.author: JF

customer_reviews.title: Best value!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't actually got to used this product yet. Hopefully I will not ever have to. It will give me a sense of security having it on my hip when my family and I go hiking in Yellowstone and the Grand Tetons on vacation this summer. The product is a great size and the holster is convenient to have. It is the best value for the money. I searched all over the internet for a cheaper price.

customer_reviews.title: We hunt a lot and this is a good safety regarding any bear attack thank goodness it never ...
customer_reviews.text: We hunt a lot and this is a good safety regarding any bear attack thank goodness it never had to be used but great safety factor

customer_reviews.title: Predators beware
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has not had to use this yet.. I hope she never has too. Moved into her first dorm at school but I like that she has this on her!

customer_reviews.title: Bears beware
customer_reviews.text: I am ready to use it, as soon as I see a bear. This is a great product I am very pleased I found it.

customer_reviews.title: Bear Mace
customer_reviews.text: I love the holster that came with the product. It promises to spray quickly when needed and a good distance.

customer_reviews.title: bear spray
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had to use it yet, I had a pitbull in my neighborhood chase me and my dog. It was terrifying, this is why I bought it, plus for camping and actual possible bear attacks. I feel much safer carrying this with me on walks through the neighborhood.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product was exactly as described. I have not had the need to use it yet.

customer_reviews.title: I haven't had to use this yet but a great deal on two cans
customer_reviews.text: Thankfully, I haven't had to use this yet but a great deal on two cans.

customer_reviews.title: Thank goodness never had to use it, but it ...
customer_reviews.text: Thank goodness never had to use it, but it is a little large, heavy and bulky. Smaller size would work just as well.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Bear Repellent Saves Lives!
customer_reviews.text: Thank goodness I never had to use this. Bought this while I hiked the Appalachian Trail this summer. It was at my side 24x7. It's a little heavy so be prepared for the extra weight to be hitting your leg the whole time, but it's so worth it.
customer_reviews.author: mary ellen beck

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by NPS rangers
customer_reviews.text: Never had to use it but felt safe carrying it on my belt.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha A. Ross

customer_reviews.title: Bear spray
customer_reviews.text: Fortunately i didn't have to use it. We went to Yellowstone and didn't get too close to the few bears we saw. We had kids with us so this was a precaution.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Gillum

customer_reviews.title: Hike in Confidence
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had a situation where I needed to use this yet, but it does make me feel more confident when hiking alone. Let's just hope it works if I ever need to use it against a bear. On a side note, this stuff does burn if it gets in contact with your skin. I won't say how I found that out.
customer_reviews.author: JustPassingBy

customer_reviews.title: Light
customer_reviews.text: I am quite happy that this bear spray is as light as it is. Now I don't have to carry my revolver which I don't like because of the weight. I haven't used it yet. I hope that it works!
customer_reviews.author: Romar

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff, fair price
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works like a champ. It has good distance and is very effective. I use it for the dogs whose owners aren't smart enough to leash them and come chasing after us. It is instantly effective and not only do the dogs run off, they run the other way when they see us coming. Thankfully, no experience with bears.
customer_reviews.author: John C. Denson

customer_reviews.title: Peace of Mind
customer_reviews.text: Nice Product, Hope to never need it but I did test it in the open air and it sprayed nice. I will feel much safer camping. Fast shipping = A+

customer_reviews.title: hope I dont need it
customer_reviews.text: appears to be everything it is advertized to be, will provide more info if i have the opportunity to use it...

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good for neighborhood dogs that chase your car barking every time you pass them.

customer_reviews.text: I'm not quite sure if it works, but I definitely felt safer with it by my side.

customer_reviews.text: haven't used it buuuutt.... its a can of bear pepper spray with a holster.. so i guess its exactly like the description said!

customer_reviews.text: The bear Guard Alaska Bear Pepper Spray with Holster arrived on time in good condition. I have not had to use it yet but friends who are outdoorsmen recommend it.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I brought this with me whenever we go out camping & I just like simply like it, This was recommended by a good friend & I was not disappointed.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Great product my daughter has a bear in her yard occasionally and this is for he safety

product_meta.title: Guard Alaska Bear Spray with Nylon Holster
product_meta.description: Guard Alaska's Bear spray ultra hot pepper spray has proven so effective repelling bears, it is the only one registered with the EPA as a repellent for ALL SPECIES of bear! This bear spray is absolutely the most effective and powerful bear Guard defense spray available today. Guard Alaska Bear Spray is environmentally safe! Does not contain flammable or ozone depleting substances. This bear spray formula is scientifically proven superior, and endorsed by the Alaska Science & Technology Foundation. 9 Ounce Super size. Range: Approximately 15-20 feet. Dimensions: 8-3/4" x 2" - Holster is Nylon with Velcro Closure, and has a belt loop. Package is for One Bear Spray, and one holster.
feature_bullets: EFFECTIVE BEAR PROTECTION - Includes TWO (2) Guard Alaska 9 oz. bear repellent spray canister (4 year shelf life) and ONE (1) Pepper Enforcement metal belt clip holster
TESTED & PROVEN - Guard Alaska was intensively tested for six years in the Alaska wild, and it is the only bear repellent registered with the EPA as a repellent effective against ALL bears

9 SECOND CONTINUOUS SPRAY - Releases 9 ounces of bear protection in 9 seconds, or may be fired in bursts - Fogger delivery system sprays 15-20 feet quickly engulfing attacking bear for maximum effectiveness
MAXIMUM STRENGTH - 1.34% total capsaicinoid formula, 9 ounce (255 Grams) UltraMag shotgun size canister, EZ Access Firemaster Actuator

ENVIRONMENTALLY SAFE - Does not contain flammable or ozone depleting substances - Only EPA approved bear spray effective against ALL bear species - The Guard Alaska Bear Spray formula is scientifically proven superior, and endorsed by the Alaska Science & Technology Foundation - Be safe, protect yourself with Guard Alaska
